original_title: Foreign Minister Sabry to participate at Doha Forum
original_body_lines: Minister of Foreign Affairs Ali Sabry is scheduled to make an official visit to the State of Qatar from 09 - 12 December 2023 to participate in the Doha Forum.
The Sri Lankan lawmaker will take part in the high-level panel as panellist on the topic of BRICS Rising Influence in the Multipolar International Order.

The Doha Forum is a global platform sponsored by the State of Qatar, aimed at bringing together leaders and policymakers to discuss critical challenges facing the world and to build innovative and action-driven networks.

During the visit, Minister Sabry is scheduled to meet with the Qatari Prime Minister, who also holds the portfolio of Foreign Affairs, and discuss further enhancement of the strong bilateral relations.
Minister Sabry will also meet with senior officials of the Qatar Investment Authority, and prominent business entities in Qatar.
